item.description:
We will only have the 4th-Tuesday, 6/24, meetup because no room available on the 2nd-Tuesday, 6/10, at Nashua Public Library.

Same format as the usual, we'll go around the room to ask each participant to make a speech in both Chinese and English, usually do an introduction of yourself, and get the conversations going.
item.how_to_find_us: Check with the librarian, we usually have the Hunt Conference room.
item.why: As in learning any language, practising makes it perfect, there's no substitute for it ;)
item.name: Help2LearnChinese July Meetup
